text: Ho creato il team perlis su GitHub Classroom, andate su <https://github.com/orgs/softeng-inf-uniba/teams> trovate il nostro team ed entrateci, spostatevi sulla scheda Members e cliccate su Request to Join

attachments.title: Build software better, together
attachments.text: GitHub is where people build software. More than 27 million people use GitHub to discover, fork, and contribute to over 80 million projects.
